remarks: The singletons consisting of ordered triples which have distinct third components are disjunct.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Mar-2018.)
statement:
otsndisj $p |- ( ( A e. X /\ B e. Y ) -> Disj_ c e. V { <. A , B , c >. } ) $.
$d A c $.
$d B c $.
$d V c $.
$d X c $.
$d Y c $.
